OOC:: thanks being easy on me here. 

Ice::
She tried to dive out of the way, but the dragon got her by the 
wing.  She roared out as the teeth peirced the flesh and almost tore 
the wing from her shoulder.  She still swiped at him.  Then she tried 
another idea.  She closed her eyes, ignoring the pain, and sent the 
mental image of the dragon's scales starting to fall off.  Then the 
dragon's skin started to peel away. MEch fluid running fast down his 
body.  It was a grusome thought, but she tried hard to make the 
dragon think it was really happening. With luck, he'd gasp in fear 
and let her go. 




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Megaton stood tall taking the shot, his thick scales prevented any 
major
> damage. Another shot, then another. The blows fealt like a few 
punches
> instead of claws. The dragon was beginning to feal annoyed by the 
winged
> polar bear swatting at him. Without warning the great beast snapped 
his head
> forward, biting at Ice's puny body.
> 
> ------------------------------------------------------
> 
> ::Prowl::
> 
> Prowl nods, weapons still ready. "Why did you come to the Maximal
> base then?"
> 
> The Dragon watches his playthings attacking as he spoke, "I came to 
make you
> an offer you can't refuse." (Sorry couldn't resist) the mutant was 
almost
> enjoying himself watching the other mutants futile attempts to hurt 
him.
> "And as soon as anyone important shows up I'll make that offer 
yessssss" His
> Megatron side was working it's way into his logic, this was one 
thing he'd
> tried to avoid. The former Pred leader would have destroyed these 
bots
> before the fight began but that would leave the faction weak.
> 
> Lunarpine saw the futal attempts that Ice was using and transformed 
to his
> half wolf mode. again he hit Megaton with his howl in the back.
> 
> Megaton was caught off gaurd and forced forward, He remained on his 
feet and
> swung backward at the wolf with his spiked tail. Lunarpine easily 
avoided it
> by leaping straight up and over the tail.
